name: Browser_Navigate
description:
Navigates the user to a different screen/route in the application without reloading the browser. Use this tool when the user asks to go to a specific page, view, or section of the application.

Available routes:

**Main Routes:**
- `/` or `/welcome` or `/home` - Home/Welcome page
- `/tasks` - Tasks workspace
- `/workspace/:id` - Specific workspace (replace :id with actual workspace ID)
- `/shared-with-me` - Shared items page
- `/profile` - User profile page
- `/stripe` - Stripe payment page
- `/settings` - Settings main page
- `/stuff` - Stuff page
- `/plugins` - Plugins page
- `/plugins/:pluginId/settings` - Plugin settings (replace :pluginId with actual plugin ID)
- `/admin/plugins` - Plugin management (admin)
- `/boards` - Boards list page
- `/boards/:boardId` - Board detail page (replace :boardId with actual board ID)
- `/broadcasts` - Broadcasts page

**Settings Sub-pages:**
- `/settings/categories` - Categories management
- `/settings/categories/custom-fields` - Custom fields for categories
- `/settings/templates` - Templates management
- `/settings/forms` - Forms management
- `/settings/workspaces` - Workspaces management
- `/settings/teams` - Teams management
- `/settings/spots` - Spots management
- `/settings/spots/types` - Spot types management
- `/settings/job-positions` - Job positions management
- `/settings/users` - Users management
- `/settings/roles-and-permissions` - Roles and permissions management
- `/settings/statuses` - Statuses management
- `/settings/priorities` - Priorities management
- `/settings/tags` - Tags management
- `/settings/slas` - SLAs management
- `/settings/workflows` - Workflows management
- `/settings/approvals` - Approvals management
- `/settings/global` - Global settings
- `/settings/boards` - Boards settings
- `/settings/test` - Test page

**Compliance Routes:**
- `/compliance/standards` - Compliance standards list
- `/compliance/standards/:id` - Compliance standard detail (replace :id with actual standard ID)

**Authentication Routes (public):**
- `/auth/signin` - Sign in page
- `/auth/signup` - Sign up page
- `/auth/invitation/:token` - Invitation sign up (replace :token with invitation token)

**Other Routes:**
- `/onboarding` - Onboarding flow

**URL Parameters and Tabs:**
Some pages use URL query parameters to control tabs or specific views. Include these parameters in the path when navigating:
- `/settings/forms?tab=builder` - Forms builder tab (use when user wants to create/edit forms)
- `/settings/forms?tab=builder&editing_form=<id>` - Forms builder with a specific form loaded for editing (replace <id> with form ID)
- `/settings?tab=advanced` - Settings advanced tab
- `/settings?tab=basics` - Settings basics tab
- `/settings?tab=favorites` - Settings favorites tab
- `/broadcasts?tab=pending` - Broadcasts pending tab

**Usage Examples:**
- To navigate to settings: use path `/settings`
- To navigate to a specific workspace: use path `/workspace/123` (replace 123 with actual ID)
- To navigate to categories: use path `/settings/categories`
- To navigate to a board: use path `/boards/456` (replace 456 with actual board ID)
- To navigate to forms builder: use path `/settings/forms?tab=builder`
- To navigate to forms builder editing a form: use path `/settings/forms?tab=builder&editing_form=789` (replace 789 with form ID)
- To navigate to broadcasts pending tab: use path `/broadcasts?tab=pending`

**Important Notes:**
- Always use the exact path format shown above
- Replace dynamic parameters (like :id, :pluginId, :boardId, :token) with actual values when navigating
- Include URL query parameters (?tab=...) when navigating to pages with tabs or specific views
- The navigation happens instantly without page reload, preserving the application state
- If the user asks to 'go to' or 'open' a page, use this tool

path.description: The route path to navigate to. Must be one of the available routes listed in the tool description. Include URL query parameters (?tab=...) when navigating to pages with tabs. Examples: '/settings', '/settings/categories', '/workspace/123', '/boards/456', '/settings/forms?tab=builder', '/settings/forms?tab=builder&editing_form=789'
